item.title: September 2010
item.itunes:author: Dave Pesto
item.description:
01: Some Chords - Deadmau5
02: Animal Rights - Deadmau5 % Wolfgang Gartner
03: Devil Walking - Mark Knight
04: Let's All Chant [Manuel De La Mare & Marshall Remix] - Federico Scavo
05: Hearts Under Fire - Lea Luna & Miles Dyson
06: Somewhere - DJ Mog ft. Sarah Lynn
07: Party of Politics - EDX
08: Spotlight ft. Tesz Millan [Tune Brothers Remix] - The Good Guys
09: Freak [Vocal Disco Mix] - Ivan Pica
10: Creopola (Booty Shake) - Rino Cabrera
11: Electric State [Dirtyloud Mix] - Electric Soulside
12: Binary 1.0 [Lazy RIch Remix] - Alex Mind
13: Models on Cocaine [Weekend Heroes Remix] - Ticon
14: Don't You Know [Keemerah Remix] - Dead Wasps
item.itunes:subtitle: The first all new podcast from Dave Pesto
